Value.label: Partner ID
Value.Help: Partner ID

Value.label: Device Tag
Value.Help: Device Tag

Value.label: Reset configuration settings to factory defaults
Value.Help: Reset to factory defaults.

Value.label: Basic Set Report when sensor is restored
Value.Help: Configures the sensor to send or not send Basic Set commands of 0x00 to nodes in Association group 2 turning the devices off when the sensor is in a restored state (i.e. motion not detected). By default the sensor does NOT send Basic Set commands of 0x00.

Value.label: Basic Set Report
Value.Help: Configures the sensor to either to send or not to send Sensor Binary Report commands to Association Group 1 when the sensor is faulted and restored.

Value.label: Meter Count
Value.Help: 0 TO 2147483647 count rolls over at 99,999,999

Value.label: Meter Reporting Interval
Value.Help: 0 to 2,550 seconds

Value.label: Meter Threshold
Value.Help: Low vs High flow 0 to 65535

Value.label: Report selection
Value.Help: MultiLevel Sensor Report vs Notification Toggle

Value.label: Fault restore
Value.Help: Enable/Disable Basic Sets of 0x00 on a fault restore to nodes in Group 2

Value.label: Fault restore
Value.Help: Enable/Disable Basic Sets of 0x00 on a fault restore to nodes in Group 2

Value.label: System Type
Value.Help: 0 = Standard, 1 = Heat Pump

Value.label: Fan Type
Value.Help: 0 = Gas (no fan w/Heat), 1 = Electric (Fan w/Heat)

Value.label: Change Over Type
Value.Help: 0 = w/Cool, 1 = w/Heat

Value.label: 2nd Stage Heat Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no 2nd stage heat, 1 = 2nd stage heat

Value.label: Aux Heat Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no aux heat, 1 = aux heat enabled

Value.label: 2nd Stage Cool Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no 2nd stage cool, 1 = 2nd stage cool

Value.label: Temperature Unit
Value.Help: 0 = Celsius, 1 = Fahrenheit

Value.label: Minimum Off Time
Value.Help: Sets the Minimum Off Time (MOT) delay before another heating/cooling cycle can begin

Value.label: Minimum Run Time
Value.Help: Sets the Minimum Run Time (MRT) delay before a heating/cooling cycle can turn of

Value.label: Setpoint H/C Delta
Value.Help: Sets the minimum separation between heating and cooling setpoints

Value.label: H Delta Stage 1 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 heating starts

Value.label: H Delta Stage 1 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 heating stops

Value.label: H Delta Stage 2 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 heating starts

Value.label: H Delta Stage 2 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delay from setpoint that stage 2 heating stops

Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 3 heating starts

Value.label: H Delta Stage 2 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 3 heating stops

Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 cooling starts

Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 cooling stops

Value.label: C Delta Stage 2 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 cooling starts

Value.label: C Delta Stage 2 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 cooling stops

Value.Help: Sets the time from last button press that the backlight will turn OFF

Value.label: Power, energy detection mode
Value.Help: For parameters of 101 ~ 103, power, energy detection mode configuration

Value.label: Selective reporting
Value.Help: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.

Value.label: Wattage Threshold Whole HEM
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C1
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C2
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

Value.label: Wattage Threshold C3
Value.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change Whole HEM
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (whole HEM).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C1
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C2
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2).

Value.label: Wattage Percentage Change C3
Value.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3).

Value.label: Reporting CRC-16 Encapsulation Command
Value.Help: Enable /disable reporting CRC-16 Encapsulation Command.

Value.label: Reset #101-103
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 101-103. Any value other then 0 will initiate this reset.

Value.label: Group 1 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group1. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 2: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 3: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

Value.label: Group 2 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group2. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 2: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 3: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

Value.label: Group 3 Reports
Value.Help: Which reports need to send in group3. Format is as follows: Byte 1 (msb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 2: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 3: Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 3) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 2) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Clamp 1) Byte 4 (lsb): Bit 7: Reserved Bit 6: Reserved Bit 5: Auto Send Meter Report (for kVar) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 4: Auto Send Meter Report (for KVah) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 3: Auto Send Meter Report (for A) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 2: Auto Send Meter Report (for V) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 1: Auto Send Meter Report (for Watt) at the group time interval (Whole HEM) Bit 0: Auto Send Meter Report (for kWh) at the group time interval (Whole HEM)

Value.label: Reset #111-113
Value.Help: Reset to default parameters number 111-113

Value.label: Group 1 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 1.

Value.label: Group 2 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 2

Value.label: Group 3 Interval
Value.Help: The interval of sending report group 3

Value.label: Lock/Unlock Configuration
Value.Help: Lock/ unlock all configuration parameters

Value.label: Reset To Factory Defaults
Value.Help: Reset to factory defaults

Item.label: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network

Value.label: LED Light
Value.Help: Sets when the LED on the switch is lit.

Value.label: Invert Switch
Value.Help: Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON.

Value.label: System Type
Value.Help: 0 = Standard, 1 = Heat Pump

Value.label: Fan Type
Value.Help: 0 = Gas (no fan w/Heat), 1 = Electric (Fan w/Heat)

Value.label: Change Over Type
Value.Help: 0 = w/Cool, 1 = w/Heat

Value.label: 2nd Stage Heat Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no 2nd stage heat, 1 = 2nd stage heat

Value.label: Aux Heat Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no aux heat, 1 = aux heat enabled

Value.label: 2nd Stage Cool Enable
Value.Help: 0 = no 2nd stage cool, 1 = 2nd stage cool

Value.label: Temperature Unit
Value.Help: 0 = Celsius, 1 = Fahrenheit

Value.label: Minimum Off Time
Value.Help: Sets the Minimum Off Time (MOT) delay before another heating/cooling cycle can begin

Value.label: Minimum Run Time
Value.Help: Sets the Minimum Run Time (MRT) delay before a heating/cooling cycle can turn of

Value.label: Setpoint H/C Delta
Value.Help: Sets the minimum separation between heating and cooling setpoints

Value.label: H Delta Stage 1 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 heating starts

Value.label: H Delta Stage 1 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 heating stops

Value.label: H Delta Stage 2 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 heating starts

Value.label: H Delta Stage 2 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delay from setpoint that stage 2 heating stops

Value.label: H Delta Aux ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 3 heating starts

Value.label: H Delta Stage 2 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 3 heating stops

Value.label: C Delta Stage 1 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 cooling starts

Value.label: C Delta Stage 1 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 cooling stops

Value.label: C Delta Stage 2 ON
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 cooling starts

Value.label: C Delta Stage 2 OFF
Value.Help: Sets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 cooling stops

Value.label: Display Lock
Value.Help: Display Lock

Value.label: Backlight Timer
Value.Help: Sets the time from last button press that the backlight will turn OFF

Value.label: Max Heat Setpoint
Value.Help: Sets the maximum heating setpoint value

Value.label: Min Cool Setpoint
Value.Help: Sets the minimum cooling setpoint value

Value.label: Schedule Enable
Value.Help: Enable or disable thermostat's local scheduler

Value.label: Run/Hold Mode
Value.Help: 0 = Hold, 1 = Run

Value.label: Setback Mode
Value.Help: 0 = No setback, 2 = Un-occupied mode

Value.label: Un-Occupied HSP
Value.Help: Heat Setpoint for Unoccupied mode

Value.label: Un-Occupied CSP
Value.Help: Cool Setpoint for Unoccupied mode

Value.label: Remote Sensor 1 Node Number
Value.Help: Node number for Remote Sensor 1

Value.label: Remote Sensor 1 Temperature
Value.Help: Temperature of Remote Sensor 1

Value.label: Internal Sensor Temp Offset
Value.Help: Internal Sensor Temperature Offset

Value.label: R1 Sensor Temp Offset
Value.Help: R1 Sensor Temperature Offset

Value.label: Filter Timer
Value.Help: Timer to let know when to change or clean the filter

Value.label: Max Filter Timer
Value.Help: Maximum allowed value for filter timer

Value.label: Heat Timer
Value.Help: Heat Timer in hours

Value.label: Cool Timer
Value.Help: Cool Timer in hours

Value.label: Fan Purge Heat
Value.Help: Fan purge period for Heat mode

Value.label: Fan Purge Cool
Value.Help: Fan purge period for Cool mode

Value.label: Basic Set Report when sensor is restored
Value.Help: Configures the sensor to send or not send Basic Set commands of 0x00 to nodes in Association group 2 turning the devices off when the sensor is in a restored state (i.e. motion not detected). By default the sensor does NOT send Basic Set commands of 0x00.

Value.label: Basic Set Report
Value.Help: Configures the sensor to either to send or not to send Sensor Binary Report commands to Association Group 1 when the sensor is faulted and restored.

Value.label: Basic Set Report when sensor is restored
Value.Help: Configures the sensor to send or not send Basic Set commands of 0x00 to nodes in Association group 2 turning the devices off when the sensor is in a restored state (i.e. motion not detected). By default the sensor does NOT send Basic Set commands of 0x00.

Value.label: Basic Set Report
Value.Help: Configures the sensor to either to send or not to send Sensor Binary Report commands to Association Group 1 when the sensor is faulted and restored.

Value.label: PIR Trigger Off Period
Value.Help: Period to send Trigger Off command after PIR is triggered.

Value.label: Lux sensor threshold
Value.Help: When the lux level falls below this threshold and the PIR gets triggered, the unit emits a Basic Set Command (Value=0xFF) and turns on its floodlight. This overwrites the Lux level set by the Lux knob. Setting = 0: Never turn ON light when PIR triggered Setting = 30~200: Turn ON light when lux is below configured threshold. Setting = 255: Always turn ON light when PIR triggered If the level is set to 0, the unit will not turn on its floodlight. The sensor will only send a notification report to the controller.

Value.label: Auto Report luminance interval
Value.Help: sets the interval of periodic lux level report to the controller

Value.label: Control Mode
Value.Help: Set the switch to control other devices or issue various scene activation commands to a central controller.

Value.label: Invert Switch
Value.Help: Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON.

Group.label: Top/bottom button click and holding down
Top/bottom button double-click and holding down
